author: Lance Stratton
comment: Great idea. Just what I was looking for! I only use the phone battery complication on the watch and it works perfect. Any way to disable the charging notifications? Thanks. Great work!  EDIT: Great idea, hadnt thought of just disabling the notifications from the app. I use adb on the watch for development so I was constantly receiving the notification. Great app. Functions perfectly

reply.author: Zen Barrier
reply.content: I never thought about having a way to disable the alerts since that was originally the main function. You can go into the app settings on your phone and set vibrate off and set a silent tone, or you can manually disable it from your phone's notification settings. Thanks for the rating!

author: Kevin Li
comment: App works as expected, notifications and the complications. Fixed earlier problem, if complication initially doesn't work, restart watch. Thanks to the developer for quick response. No further problems, app is great!

reply.author: Zen Barrier
reply.content: I'm sorry about that. I believe it will fix itself if you turn the watch off and on, or restart the watch.

author: David Gillett
comment: This is an excellent app. Kudos to the developer. Works every time to notify me that the battery has charged to a level of my choosing (80% is my current choice although I'd prefer to use 70% if it was included in the settings). I will happily give this 5 stars if the developer adds this and also a setting to notify at a discharged level of my choosing. (20% or 30% would suit me). Great work so far though.

author: Eddie C
comment: Good app, but to improve it, I think the watch app should mirror what the phone app does: Alert me on my watch when charging my phone and the phone battery is charged to a certain level (80% or other). Do this and I'll give it 5 stars.

author: Salt505
comment: I don't often leave reviews for apps but this app is just purely awesome.

author: Manu George
comment: I wonder why this feature was not built in the Android Wear app. Quite useful especially when you want to wear your watch all the time. This notifies me when watch is 100% charged.

author: Fionn Anderson
comment: Does what it says and does it well, but I would appreciate a setting to increase the phone's battery level frequency for the complication

author: Dustin Miller
comment: I glad someone developed a complication for phone battery thanks

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: Doesn't work standalone. If phone is not connected, app doesn't notify when watch is fully charged.

reply.author: Zen Barrier
reply.content: I'm sorry about that. Unfortunately, there is currently no way to alert the phone from the watch app without the companion app installed to create the notification. If you have an Android phone, then you can install the companion app and customize the notifications.

author: Jan Morrida
comment: Stopped alerting after last update!, Otherwise I liked it! Says full on watch, but don't get the alert on phone!

author: Henry Stern
comment: Super cool, I needed this and didn't even know it! Thanks for the well made app dev. Cheers from NYC

author: jim gate
comment: not work on Android 8

author: Dan Rothschild
comment: THANK YOU!  An app that does exactly what I need and everything it promised.

author: Scott Beckman
comment: Works as advertised on zenwatch3 with android 2.0.

author: Ochbayar Ganbold
comment: Useful app. Need more info and tools. Tnx

author: Austin Lai
comment: Was looking for this. Nice work.

author: Mister Junky
comment: Crappy
this is a great app

author: FUFR FURB
comment: Terrific

author: Robert Ferguson
comment: Just got this, tested it and it works. Wouldn't mind paying for this to support the Dev. Brilliant!
title: Works on my SmartWatch 3

author: tj pearson
comment: Love the app, easy to set up and simply let's you know when watch fully charged. Only 4 star as lacks alarm repeat, but being fair emailed developer from UK to US and he replied within 10 minutes to confirm will look into this option, if gets this to work I'd be more than happy to pay quid or so as extra full app option. Update: Hows that for service.

reply.author: Zen Barrier
reply.content: Thank you for the idea. I have added the feature and it is now available as an update.

title: Great app

author: Zach Hillyard
comment: Extremely useful and well designed. Thank you.
title: Awesome

author: Dermot L
comment: Works perfectly on Asus Zenwatch 2

author: Kevin Veroneau
comment: After installing this app, everything was fine until I powered off both my watch and phone for the night...  the next morning I powered on both devices as I normally do, but my moto 360 wouldn't connect over Bluetooth anymore.  It oddly connected over wifi, but that meant I could really use my watch after leaving home.   Checking my app list, this was the only app I removed which fixed that weird problem...  I am using a Nexus 6 is that means anything.  Cool idea for an app, but doesn't something weird.
title: Had to factory reset Moto 360

comment: Simple app. Does what it's supposed to. Only issues I have had is that the "battery charging" notification (with the percent bar) doesnt dissapear when I stop charging the watch
